sentence.Network_en: He would sign off each week with the catch-phrase, "I'llsee thee!"
sentence.Network_cn: 每周结束节目时他都会说那句经典的话，“下周见！”。
亲爱的父亲，孩儿想念您。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... theatrical 戏剧化的 thee 你 theft 偷窃.
英文诵典系列---Clear your mental space.... ... tempest 暴风雨，骚乱，动乱 thee 古英语，你 wakefulness 失眠.

and it came to pass , when the ark forward , that Moses said , Rise up , LORD , and let thine enemies be scattered ; and let them that hate thee flee before thee .约柜往前行的时候、摩西就说、耶和华阿、求你兴起、愿你的仇敌四散、愿恨你的人从你面前逃跑。
drunk with the joy of singing I forget myself and call thee friend who art my lord .我沉醉于歌唱的喜悦，忘了自己。你是我的主人，我却称你为我的朋友。

list.abs: I tell thee ,' said madame , extending her right hand , for emphasis ,' that although it is a long time on the road , it is on the road and coming .“告诉你，”老板娘伸出右手强调说，“虽然它在路上的时间很长，它却已经上了路，走过来了。
and he said , Leave us not , I pray thee ; forasmuch as thou knowest how we are to encamp in the wilderness and thou mayest be to us instead of eyes .摩西说、求你不要离开我们、因为你知道我们要在旷野安营、你可以当作我们的眼目。
in faith i do not love thee with mine eyes ., 我不真的凭我的眼睛来爱你.

therefore thus saith the Lord ; Behold , I am against thee , O Tyrus and will cause many nations to come up against thee , as the sea caused his waves to come up .所以，主耶和华如此说，推罗阿，我必与你为敌，使许多国民上来攻击你，如同海使波浪涌上来一样。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English thē, accusative and dative case of thū 'thou'

entry.tran: 你，汝，尔(旧时用词，现亦用于诗歌或宗教类语境，用作宾格)
entry.def: Thee is an old-fashioned, poetic, or religious word for 'you' when you are talking to only one person. It is used as the object of a verb or preposition.

example.tran: 亲爱的父亲，孩儿想念您。

auth_sentence.content: Shall I compare thee to a summer's day?

auth_sentence.content: Ashamed am I that I should tell it thee.

auth_sentence.content: I will come and wake thee on the morrow.
